Release Notes:
What's New:
  • Functionality to Certify, Recertify, and Decertify Trucks
  • Functionality to create/update a Load Ticket
  • Functionality to complete a First Day FOO checklist
  • Functionality to complete an Every Day FOO checklist
  • Functionality to complete a Damage Report intake form
  • Functionality to complete an Incident Issue intake form
  • Functionality to upload Damage Release documentation
Bug Fix:
  • Fix in App misspelling of Shredded C&D Material

Bug Fixes

  • Update the sub queries used in the calculations for the Cost Share percentage 
  • Update ADM data for PW folder 4339-FPA-PW-000001768 Obligated Amount 
  • Updated the DRS_Subrecipient role to be able to see the Proof of Payment tab

Data Updates

  • Update Total Insurance Deduction amount in the Project Cost section

What's New
  • Added a Completed CR tab to the CR Active Report.
Bug Fixes
  • Edited the HM 404 LOI report to remove all the LOIs in the Draft Stage from the report and change the calculation of Submitted LOI to represent All LOI Universe submitted. 

  • Data Updates (Internal)

  • Data source shift for 2 PF Reports to use GP_Projects View.

What's New
  • Functionality update to UAR COR3 Security Group Admin Tool to allow user access look-up functionality.

What's New
  • Functionality update to update CR Splitting workflow to open new or "split" CR at Stage #6 (Requirements Development Stage.)
  • Functionality update to role assignment for Custom List - Inactive Change Requests view in the CR Tool.

What's New:
  • Functionality to enable a hyperlink to direct user to a Project from within a Task Order
  • Functionality to provide a Sector Lead the ability to directly edit or return a Task Order to SPDMG for Task Order edits. 
  • Functionality to send an email notification to the Sector Lead to assign a Contractor to a Task Order
  • Functionality to send an email notification to the Contractor to provide a Task Order Level of Effort
  • Functionality to send an email notification to the Sector Lead to conduct a Task Order Level of Effort Review
  • Functionality to send an email notification to the Sector Lead to conduct a Task Order Level of Effort Review​
  • Functionality to add FEMA process step field at all the Project folder tabs
  • Moved several folder from Canceled state to Active stage
  • Created a new Task Order Custom List
  • Functionality for SPDMGs and Sector Leads to view Notes associated to all Task Order types
  • Functionality for Contractor to view the Step 1 & 2 Level of Effort Negotiation Notes
  • Functionality to send an email notification to Assigned SPDMG when DDD Review is marked as Agree, Agree with Comments or Not needed


Bug Fix:​
  • Remove canceled damages from display on  Damages tab

What's New
  • Functionality update to Include BCA Reports/Docs in Required Uploads Table.

What's New
  • Functionality update to add the ability for the PPDR Stakeholder to approve ICF invoices on Supervisor Review Stage
  • Functionality update to add a lookup of the Project Number of COR3 at the Federal Bucket tab in the Admin tool
  • Functionality update to add a Contact Management feature for the Contractor to add extra contacts to CIM
  • Functionality update to include the additional contacts on the notification emails related to their Contractor
  • Functionality update to display project costs from the Project Worksheet in the Obligation Details of the RFR.
  • Functionality update to display the project cost category in the Compliance tab of the RFR.
Bug Fixes
  • Update to role for Branch Analysts to allow for Payment Request/RFR Submission
